name: authspark-client
description: Authspark is a plug-and-play authentication and user management system designed for developers. With just a few lines of integration, it enables seamless email-password login/signup, real-time active user tracking, user metadata management, and project-specific user insights â€” all backed by a simple, customizable React component and secure API. Perfect for SaaS platforms or internal tools that need quick and reliable user auth without building everything from scratch.
author: Saish Dhuri
